name: Write'n'Slash
description:
In Write'n'Slash play Molly, a doll who dreams to write like humans!

However, the other toys are reluctant to this idea and will do everything to prevent it...

Forget the mouse, the keyboard is your only weapon against the waves of toys that want to stop you from learning new words.

______

Write'n'Slash was made during the ISART Digital's Game Week 2019 in Paris. 

The theme was : "Hack'n' Slash + ..." It means that we were supposed to mix the genre hack'n slash with another genre.

So I pitched Write'n'Slash,  a text-based hack'n slash!

______

At the end of the Game Week other jammers played other's people games (at least 25 games) and voted. We won the "Best Gameplay" award!

______

Thanks to this amazing team we made Write'n'Slash in less than 4 days!
